name: Zombie Shooter (itch) (CaptainMD)
description:
This is a shooter game where you have to kill zombies 

Instructions

1. Press P to open shop where you can buy weapon upgrades and more

2.You will get money if you kill zombies

3.Press h to go to heart shop and buy hearts and press space to go back

4. You have two guns pistol and machine gun press 1 or 2 to get them

5.PLAY IT NOW
